name: bnj519

stmt.origin: mpan(wcel(c0, universe), wfun(csn(cop(c1, c0))), wcel(c1, universe))
stmt.pretty: mpan(c0 ∈ 𝕌, Fun({ < c1, c0 > }), c1 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wfun(csn(cop(c1, c0))))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe)), wfun(csn(cop(c1, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wfun(csn(cop(c1, c0))))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe)), wfun(csn(cop(c1, c0))))
